title: CI fails when run locally

labels.name: D-Trivial
labels.description: Nice and easy! A great choice to get started with Bevy

labels.name: A-Build-System
labels.description: Related to build systems or continuous integration

labels.name: C-Code-Quality
labels.description: A section of code that is hard to understand or change

labels.name: S-Ready-For-Implementation
labels.description: This issue is ready for an implementation PR. Go for it!

body:
## Bevy version

0.16-dev (main branch)

## \[Optional\] Relevant system information

MacOS Sequoia 15.3.2

## What you did

I ran `cargo run -p ci`

## What went wrong

The CI fails with the errors shown below.

## Additional information

